servinfo.title: Valve and Cylinder Head Assembly Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Valve and Cylinder Head Assembly Components:F9Q

s1.ptxt: Remove engine assembly referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Remove timing belt referring to Timing Belt and Belt Tensioner Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Remove turbocharger referring to Turbocharger Assembly Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Remove EGR cooler referring to EGR Pipe and EGR Cooler Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Remove oil separator referring to Oil Separator Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Remove EGR valve referring to EGR Valve Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Remove ventilation pipe No.2 referring to Oil Separator Components:F9Q .
Remove injection pump rear bracket referring to Injection Pump Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.
Loosen cylinder head bolts in numerical order (“1” through “10”) as shown in figure, and remove them.

attention2.ptxt: Never reuse cylinder head bolts once removed it due to plastic deformation tightening. Be sure to use new cylinder head bolts when installing.

s1.ptxt: Check all around cylinder head for any other parts required to be removed or disconnected, and remove or disconnect whatever necessary.
Remove cylinder head and cylinder head gasket from cylinder block.
Remove dowel pins, if necessary.
Remove vacuum pump referring to Vacuum Pump Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.
Remove thermostat assembly referring to Thermostat Assembly Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.
Remove intake and exhaust manifolds referring to Intake Manifold and Exhaust Manifold Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.
Remove camshaft and tappets referring to Camshaft and Tappet Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.
Remove fuel injector referring to Fuel Injector Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.
Remove injection pump referring to Injection Pump Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.
Remove common rail (high pressure fuel injection rail) referring to Common Rail (High Pressure Fuel Injection Rail) Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Valve and Cylinder Head Assembly Inspection:F9Q

s1.ptxt: Remove oil, old sealant and dust from bolt holes and mating surface of cylinder head and cylinder block.
Install camshaft and tappets referring to Camshaft and Tappet Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install cylinder head cover referring to Cylinder Head Cover Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install injection pump referring to Injection Pump Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install common rail (high pressure fuel injection rail) referring to Common Rail (High Pressure Fuel Injection Rail) Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install fuel injector referring to Fuel Injector Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install high pressure pipes referring to High Pressure Pipe Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install intake and exhaust manifolds referring to Intake Manifold and Exhaust Manifold Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install vacuum pump referring to Vacuum Pump Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install thermostat assembly referring to Thermostat Assembly Removal and Installation:F9Q , if removed.
Install dowel pins (1) to cylinder block, if removed.
Install new cylinder head gasket (2) to cylinder block.
Install cylinder head to cylinder block, and tighten new cylinder head bolts as follows.

s2.ptxt: Tighten cylinder head bolts to 30 N·m (3.0 kgf-m, 22.0 lbf-ft) according to numerical order (“1” through “10”) as shown in figure.
Retighten them by turning through 100° in same manner as Step a).
Loosen cylinder head bolts (“1” and “2”) until they are completely free, and tighten them to 25 N·m (2.5 kgf-m, 18.0 lbf-ft), then retighten then by turning through 213°.
Loosen and tighten bolts (“3” and “4”), bolts (“5” and “6”), bolts (“7” and “8”) then bolt (“9” and “10”) in the same manner as Step d).

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 30 N·m (3.0 kgf-m, 22.0 lbf-ft), 100°, 0 N·m (0.0 kgf-m, 0.0 lbf-ft), 25 N·m (2.5 kgf-m, 18.0 lbf-ft) and 213° by the specified procedure

s1.ptxt: Install injection pump rear bracket referring to Injection Pump Removal and Installation:F9Q , if necessary.
Install EGR valve referring to EGR Valve Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Install oil separator referring to Oil Separator Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Install EGR cooler referring to EGR Pipe and EGR Cooler Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Install turbocharger referring to Turbocharger Assembly Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Install ventilation pipe No.2 referring to Oil Separator Components:F9Q .
Install timing belt referring to Timing Belt and Belt Tensioner Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Install engine assembly referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:F9Q .
